scripts.build:linux: cd src && GOOS=linux GOARCH=amd64 go build -o ../../xsuite-lightsimulnet-linux-amd64/bin/lsproxy -ldflags "-extldflags '-Wl,-rpath,\$ORIGIN'"
scripts.build:darwin: cd src && GOOS=darwin GOARCH=amd64 go build -o ../../xsuite-lightsimulnet-darwin-amd64/bin/lsproxy -ldflags "-extldflags '-Wl,-rpath,@loader_path'"
